text:
This gives:
   \[
   \text{Probability} = \frac{\text{Number of favorable outcomes}}{\text{Total number of outcomes}} = \frac{1}{14}
   \]

class-2-reason: The sentence implements the probability formula, substituting the correct numbers and expressing the probability in mathematical terms.
